instructions.de: Scharf rechts weiterfahren auf Cool highway
instructions.en: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway

instructions.fr: Continuer franchement à droite sur Cool highway
instructions.id: Terus tajam kanan ke Cool highway
instructions.it: Continua a destra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj ostro w prawo na Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Continue acentuadamente à direita em Cool highway
instructions.ru: Резко поверните направо на Cool highway
instructions.sv: Sväng högeroch fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь різко праворуч на Cool highway
instructions.vi: Quẹo gắt bên phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway
